author: M.T.J.
title: Come On Down
text: No tengo vida, no siento mas que calor
No tengo alma no yo no tengo dolor
No tengo dinero no tengo mas que el amor
No tengo vida quiero llorar este dolor
Everybody comes to a raggy party
Come in all right to my floar tonight yeah
Everybody's coming and what's up baby
Tell me Tell me Tell me
I'm a commander now follow me, there
Everybody's coming stay with us, now
Tell me what do you need-oh baby
Well well well
Come on down - come on in-yes I really get down
I say
Down-come on in baby I really get down
Come on down-come on in now I really get down
You know
Down-now baby
Now really get down
En mi alma en mi vida yo quiero el amor
La pasion de mi vida es la chica el mi amor
Yo no quiero llorar, no quiero dolor
Quiero solo mi chica un poquito de amor
Everybody come to a raggy party
Come in all right to my floar tonight yeah
Everybody's coming and what's up baby
Tell me Tell me Tell me
I'm a commander now follow me, there
Everybody's coming stay with us, now
Tell me what do you need-oh baby
Well well well
Come on down - come on in-yes I really get down
I say
Down-come on in baby I really get down
Come on down-come on in now I really get down
You know
Down-now baby
Now really get down
